TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObjRef extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IObjectReference, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class ObjRef Implements IObjectReference, ISerializable
type ObjRef = class interface IObjectReference interface ISerializable

summary.span: 存储生成代理以与远程对象通信所需的所有相关信息。

span.span: Stores all relevant information required to generate a proxy in order to communicate with a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是扩展 （MBR）的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object that extends (MBR). 用于在 边界之间传输对象引用。A is used to transfer an object reference across a boundary. 为对象创建 称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 您可以通过向远程处理基础结构（请参阅 和 ）注册 MBR 对象，或在调用远程对象时将 MBR 对象作为参数传递，来显式创建 （封送 ）。You can create a (marshal a ) either explicitly, by registering the MBR object with the remoting infrastructure (see and ), or implicitly, by passing an MBR object as a parameter when calling a remote object. 远程处理使用 对象存储和传输有关正在进行远程处理 的所有相关信息。Remoting uses objects to store and transmit all the relevant information about the being remoted. 包含描述要封送处理的对象的 和类、其确切位置以及与通信相关的信息的信息，这些信息介绍了对象所在的远程处理细分。The contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, its exact location, and communication-related information on how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 封送实现 的类后，表示它的 将通过通道传输到另一个应用程序域中，可能在另一个进程或计算机中。After a class implementing is marshaled, the that represents it is transferred through a channel into another application domain, possibly in another process or computer. 当在目标应用程序域中反序列化 （请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)）时，将对其进行分析，以便为远程 MBR 对象创建透明代理。When the is deserialized (see [XML and SOAP Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization)) in the target application domain, it is parsed to create a transparent proxy for the remote MBR object. 此操作称为 "取消封送"。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 透明代理是一个对象，该对象提供实际对象驻留在客户端空间中的假象。A transparent proxy is an object that provides the illusion that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它通过使用远程处理基础结构将对其进行的调用转发到实际对象来实现此目标。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理本身由 类型的托管运行时类的实例来保存。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed run-time class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的部分功能。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象可在不考虑 中的任何远程处理细分的情况下使用。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 应用程序不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 不过，处理诸如激活、生存期管理和事务等问题的服务提供商需要进行这种区分。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. 此类在类级别建立链接要求和继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 当直接调用方或派生类没有基础结构权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](/dotnet/framework/misc/link-demands) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义 。The following code example demonstrates the use of a custom . 若要查看测试自定义 的激活代码，请参阅 方法的示例。To view the activation code that tests the custom , see the example for the method. [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化期间调用此构造函数以重新构造在流上传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 时，当前属性包含由进程中的活动通道提供的信息（有关封送处理的详细信息，请参阅 ）。The current property holds information contributed by active channels in the process, when the is created (see for details on marshaling). 其他进程或应用程序域中的通道可使用此信息来确定是否创建传输接收器来与当前实例所表示的对象进行通信。This information can be used by the channels in other processes or application domains to decide whether or not to create a transport sink to communicate with the object represented by the current instance. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前属性包含一个序列化的消息接收器链，在创建代理以表示对象时，将重新生成该链。The current property contains a serialized chain of message sinks that gets regenerated when a proxy is created to represent the object. 这仅用于 绑定的对象类型，并表示将此类运行时服务作为事务提供的对象组。This is used for bound object types only, and represents the groups of objects that provide such run-time services as transactions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含当前 所表示的远程对象类型的详细信息。 contains detailed information about the type of remote object represented by the current . 当前属性包含类型所实现的接口的列表以及类型层次结构。The current property contains a list of interfaces that the type implements, as well as the type hierarchy. 此信息可用于对代理进行增量优化，以便调整到远程对象类型的客户端视图。This information might be used to refine the proxy incrementally to adjust to the client's view of the remote object's type. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]
